name: Lunar Masquerade
description: Temporarily increases Elemental Damage and Resistance. Certain skill level also increases per the caster's skill level.

name: Chant Masquerade
description: Temporarily converts some of the Damage taken into HP. Certain skill level also increases per the caster's skill level.

name: Dauntless Masquerade
description: Temporarily increases Max HP. Certain skill level also increases per the caster's skill level.

name: Fires Masquerade
description: Temporarily increases Dodge rate against Melee attack. Certain skill level also increases per the caster's skill level.

name: Fallen Masquerade
description: Temporarily increases Dodge rate against Ranged attack. Certain skill level also increases per the caster's skill level.

name: Masquerade Master
description: Temporarily increases Physical Resistance and enables activating multiple Masquerades at the same time.
